snippet.title: When COPD Comes Before Dad: The Challenge of Getting Around
snippet.description: * When COPD Comes Before Dad: The Challenge of Getting Around I so wanted my dad to go with mom and I the other day to the soccer match at Yankee Stadium. “Dad, I’m buying a ticket for you to two matches – you can’t miss it – especially AC Milan vs. Real Madrid.” I figured this last part might get him since Rea...
